title: Gemstones - Is actually worth it?
body:
Hi all,

So we all have had at least 3 gemstones by now, some of us are (or were) lucky enough (or rich enough to buy chests + keys) to get 10 gemstones then getting an 'Exclusive Skin'.

I know (my own opinion) that this system (mostly) benefits those who buy stuff for this game.

But for people who main those champions with the Gemstone skins, seem to be either pissed off or frustrated with it (cause they want all those BEAUTIFUL skins).

So back to me question:

Is (or was) it actually worth it?

replies.body: The hextech mythic skins are soooo ordinary, I always turn them into keys and chest just in case the mythic skin drops permanently.
Meanwhile i've had 0 gemstones, out of 35 crates, and been playing since the stupid gemstone mechanic came out

That's actually 'f in the chat' worthy.

Fuck that.

I'm sure the future looks brighter ahead.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I'm at 6/10 gemstones and I've never bothered with hextech chests. Not sure which skin I'll aim for, but I don't mind.
